summary: While fighting for the political supremacy of their respective families, a Hindu man and a Muslim woman share a forbidden romance.
cast: Arjun Kapoor|Parineeti Chopra|Gauhar Khan|Anil Rastogi|Ratan Singh|Natasha Rastogi|Charu Rastogi|Shashank Khaitan|Ankit Kakar|Abdullah Osman|Akash Bathija|Aftab Khan|Jafarpal Dhillon|Meeta Bandhu|Pravin Chandra|Aradhana Dhawan|Mohd. Hafeez|Faisal Husain|Jay Shanker Pandey|Romil Saraswat|Varun Tamta
title: Ishaqzaade
